content.detailedDescription: Beautiful display of lightening with an even more beautiful ascending ufo. i love lightening storms, and periodically film them. i was hesitant to send this forward, but this one is so beautiful.
content.summary: Beautiful ascending ufo during lightening storm in nebraska - worth the watch

content.detailedDescription: Photo of object in background is similar to photo of a news story of ufo in los angeles. similarities are outstanding.
content.summary: Photo of object in background

content.detailedDescription: I live in iran in khafr city i was in the house and watching tv then i heard a voice it was like a bingggg voice and i go out in the street i saw my friend milad just stay in middle of street and watching sky it was a very big flying thing and it was very clean no sign of motor or anything to make it fly and i saw it changes color very fast and then we see the second ufo it was like a very big ball and when i scared and scream i saw my friend just ran away and my father came out and saw me and when he came. that things just gone with very very fast speed fast but visible and my father saw it but he said it may be the military object but im sure it wasnt the thing that human can made
content.summary: Im just sure is was not a secret plane it was very strange

content.detailedDescription:
While observing the night sky from my garage i noticed a single non blinking red lite low in the horizon in the nw sky. the lite was deep red larger than a conventional aircraft navitgationl lite.  after a second or two of observing the single lite, four more lites appeared forming the classic v shape.
the object appeared to turn off then reappeared a few seconds later in the northern sky traveling to the ne with one red lite on.   the object changed color from red to white, made a flash with what appeared to be a halo then disappeared. the object then reappeared in the original ne sky with only one red lite.  the object then flew up at a speed faster than an airplane or helicopter.  it then came down and made a 90 degree turn without stopping to the se, stopped, then came back to the ne. it flew to the ne, before turning off.  the object did not reappear.  
the object caught my attention due to the size of the non blinking deep red lite.  it was larger than an aircraft lite and was not blinking.  i observe aircraft and this was not conventional air traffic.  i was delighted to see something i could not explain after 60 years on this planet.
content.summary: Single deep red light approaching from the n.E.  four additional lites appeared forming classic v shape.

content.detailedDescription: Short story covers the basics. three "stars followed us down a detour in georgia in 67 when the interstate roads where being built. after following a short distance one on each side and one in the road behind us. suddenly they came in close and fast....Very bright light nothing but white light. then becoming aware again. father was driving down the road like a madman, down the gravel road detour. as fast as we were going...Another car passed us on the shoulder going even faster. we got back to a main road. things seemed to return to normal. years later my grandmother told me about missing time. can you help me find someone that could hypnotize me enuff to remember the missing time. both my sisters in phoenix also want closure in this matter. all i want to know is the truth? hope to hear back. as you know resources for this kind of thing are extremely limited. please contact me? i have no idea what else this could have been.
content.summary: On our way to visit relatives in florida in 1967. my entire family were involved in an abuction scenario.  over an hour missing time. only us 3 kids are left. we want to tell the story. interested in hypnosis to learn what happened. can you help us?

content.detailedDescription: I was looking on google earth and in south china sea i seen a ufo in the water!!
content.summary: Circle ufo with lights

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 8:30 on the night i had seen this light near my neighborhood. i happened to be working on my computer at the time and randomly glanced out the window, if anything to give my eyes a short break from the monitor. with bush intercontinental only being a few miles north of my home and a military base down in pasadena, it's not uncommon for there to be commercial / private / military aircraft flying over my neighborhood at all hours of the day and night. 

however, this light was quite different from the ones i had seen. from my viewing experience of various aircraft, i'm usually expecting to see red, white, and green lights in the sky. (maybe red or blue if there's some kind of police chase in my vicinity) but this light was just a plain, flat-white that steadily moved across the sky in a similar fashion to an airplane or helicopter. 

at first, i assumed, 'hey maybe it's some privately owned helicopter that hadn't turned on all it's lights yet' but there was no noise or audible sound and no visible aircraft. this definitely was a red flag in my head since i usually hear an aircraft before they pass over or near my neighborhood and it was still light out for things to be seen in the sky.

as for my feelings, reactions, and actions during this sighting? i just sat back in my office chair, filled with genuine curiosity as to what it could be rather than becoming fearful. the light didn’t really seem to pose much threat and just kept going in a steady path. any who, i keep watching this light, perhaps 15 to 20 seconds pass and then poof.

the light goes out in the sky and there’s no physical craft to be seen. 

due to hurricane harvey hitting houston only a week or two ago, i’m well aware of the increased military presence that’s here for rescue operations that happen to be near me. but i’ve seen plenty of helicopters at both night and day, even the actual coast guard ones that i just spoke of, and none of them behaved like that light. they always had their lights on and there’s always more than one color.
content.summary: Strange light hovered past neighborhood, only to disappear seconds later.

content.detailedDescription:
Very intimidating and my fight or flight came in immediate effect.
i didnt know what to do i was scared so i ran into my friends house.
content.summary: Dear government, please stop the corruption.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i had just put our three children down for the night. we were going outside to sit at our patio table just to chat and enjoy some evening time its so beautiful over the water. well we hadn't even had a chance to sit down yet we were walking to our table when all the sudden we noticed this huge bright light out of our peripheral vision and when we turned to look to see what it was and there it was three gargantuan lights in a row as if they were sitting on top of the pine trees about 150 feet from us. we just stared at it and then we looked at each other as if to say do you see what i see and we looked back at the lights we just stood and stared at it for about 45 seconds and it's like somebody flipped off the light switch it was just gone! he said what do you think that was i said i don't know and we agreed that we should never tell anybody because they would think we were crazy and we had three children and i was newly pregnant with our fourth. my husband and i would sometimes talk about it to each other but to this day i don't know what it was i cannot explain it, there was no sound no wind nothing just out of nowhere three lights appeared as if they turned on a light switch and then they disappeared like somebody turned off the light switch. where we were at there's really nothing a road a few homes and the gulf of mexico i just don't understand what could have done this no sound no wind just like they were there then they were gone it baffles the mind. my husband recently passed so he is no longer with us to confirm what we saw that night but i promise you this is an event i will never ever forget!
content.summary: Three gargantuan lights just appeared as if turning on a light switch right on top of the pine trees then after about 45 seconds it's like they were turned off and gone

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Hi, i have had many sightings but of lately it has been a huge white disk and a huge yellow disk. my son saw them also. i saw one i few months ago moving in the night sky  with my boyfriend that looked like a planet that stopped at a star then turned and went another direct tion. we were watching the stars that move often. i have three pics of them moving. i also see intities and i'll send that also. please get ahold if me. i have lots of strange pics and a m essage
content.summary: Huge white and yellow disk. seems to change in size. big triangle that changes size

content.detailedDescription: At about 3am i woke up with a strange feeling . as if i was just put into bed as if id been touched or naked or been looked at. something was wrong. befor i went to bed i felt as it i was being watched. after waking at 3 i tried going to sleep not quite asleep i felt something trying to pick me up out of bed, with a struggle, it left me alone. the first glimpse, it was invisible. then when it pulled away turned into a man. tall, thin, dark hair,dark eyes. and kind. when i saw his face i wasn't afraid of a man in my room or locked house!! i felt like i knew him, he felt very familiar to me.He layed down on the bed next to me then we started talking. he told me very strange things about my body! i feel like we spoke a long time but only remember a few things. i remember that he was very attentive to me, caring ,loving. he told me that in about 5days and 3 something, or 5 months and 3 days that i will find out i have ovary cancer!! i'm so confused!! i tried telling my husband about it all. he swears it was a dream but it wasn't. it was very real. the weird thing is though. i thought before i had ovarian cancer and the dr's checked and swore that i was fine!!
content.summary: Man interned my bedroom and attempted to pick me up, at first invisible.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was looking at the moon with my bionoculars when i noticed it on the other side of the telephone wires, moving away from the moon. there are a bunch of large birds flying around it , acting strange in their flight patterns. i was pretty sure right off what it was. all i have is a cell phone camera at the time. it is still there right now.
content.summary: It's just floating along ne and seems to be double bubble like & attracts lg birds

content.detailedDescription:
Object was roughly 500 feet in altitude. dim white lights, gliding silently at very low speed. at 9pm it was impossible to detect any shape. no sound what so ever. 
lights appeared to be 75-100' apart. the two red lights at aft end were in a vertical line one above the other blinking occasionally. red lights appeared to be 40-50' apart.
could not have been an aircraft, no green starboard light, no landing light, to slow to remain airborne. 
a female passenger on a motorcycle also looked up at the object while stopped at traffic light. i pulled of the road and observed the object with binoculars as it moved northward at a steady speed, never making a sound or changing course.
incident occurred at route 108/8 trumbull-stratford area.
when initially sighted the object was roughly 1000' from my vehicle to my left as i drive south on 108.
content.summary: Glided silently at an extremely low speed (10 to 15mph). light pattern was two red at aft end, one above the other blinking.,2 white lights at extreme ends.

content.detailedDescription: While camping with family and sitting around a campfire we first heard an engine like sound  when we looked up we saw a cigar shaped object with  engines on both the front and rear with flames coming out .  it appears to be goin north east and aging altitude like it was trying to  go up but the sound atvthis point was minimal.  we eventually lost site of it after it wen behind a mountain.
content.summary: Camping with family at rivernook camp grounds when heard then saw the object.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on highway 20 in california near marysville heading back towards auburn california about 7:30 p.M. on september 11th 2017 it was cloudy and very misty and very humid it had just finished raining which i noticed half a rainbow coming out of a cloud i decided to take a picture of the rainbow and noticed at the bottom of the rainbow a white orb that was moving towards the rainbow and started to move closer up about from where i was it looked a few inches up but it could have been a few hundred feet i took three photos as my girlfriend was driving from the car and you could see that the orb changed two three different directions within the photos.... most of this area is a rural area with farms in mountain ranges
content.summary: I was driving on highway 20 and noticed a rainbow which i was going to take a picture of at which point i noticed and orb following up the rainbow from the bottom and moving towards the bottom of the rainbow

content.detailedDescription: The ufo was a bright orb that descended in an unaturally straight manner and slowly dimmed into the color of the night sky.
content.summary: I saw a bright orb descend a little bit fast and slowly turned dark and disappeared in the night.

content.detailedDescription:
During a visit camping near the bradshaw ranch, i was taking photographs in and around the bradshaw ranch area. i captured two photographs that were approximately 3-5 meters from the perimeter of the ranch. 

photo 1 is spherical in nature and appears orb-like, displaying numerous variants of the color spectrum. i did not observe this object in plain view with my own eyes. only upon full screen review of my photography taken upon this evening was i able to view the said orb-like object. its actions and motions are unknown in nature. the size of the object appears to be that of a softball for perspective of comparative analysis. my feelings during the event were from retrospective thought were calm and peaceful. however, also from retrospective thought prior to the event, my feelings were trepid and tense. this shift in emotion in not explainable by rational thought. 

photo 2 is anomalous in nature, was taken at the front gate of bradshaw ranch. it was one of the last photos that i took on the evening in question during my time performing night photography at the location. the object appears to have a trace of a trail, unknown in quality, gray in color. the main focal point of the object after the trail of gray/white appears to be the actual object itself, bright white and yellow in color. it is important to note that the object starts its movement behind the squared fence line and appears to move through it. the size of the object was approximately that of a softball for comparative analysis. 

once again, note that neither of these anomalies were observable to the naked eye.
content.summary: I ohotographed two objects near bradshaw ranch. one unknown and one orb.

content.detailedDescription: I was in midland on canada at my cabin when i herd a older plane fly over i thought it was the lancaster ww2 plane we have one in mount hope on. it flys over hamilton a lot so i looked up it was just a older propeler plane at first i thought they wee those chinese laterns they were way to high it was a clear  afternoon it was 4;45pm they were above the plane at i would think 40 thousand feet they seemed to fly in a strait line their was 5 of them they would change colours and they seemed to be metelic sun seemed to bounce off them and they seemed to wink out and change colours 5 could be seen when started watching 2 minutes past and one after another they disappered we were both supprised laughed and said i think we just saw a ufo
content.summary: They looked like diamonds and changed colours and would fade and change colours

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the living room watching tv. i just saw a small orange light in the distance out of the corner of my eye. didn't think much of it. i thought it was a planet that is visable in the fall out of the same window. then after a few min i noticed it seemed much closer and thought it was blinking. i went and got my elderly mother to come look at it,my two adult children were out at the time. mom and i watched it for a few min i said that it looked to be changing colours she thought so too. i couldn't find the binoc's so i got my gun with a scope to look at it. by this time it was moving. i put the scope on 9 power and went out on the deck. i put the gun on top of the bird feeder to keep it still and looked through the scope. i could see it very clearly. it looked like a cone with a slightly domed bottom. the bottom was orange with a soft white light coming off it. the thing its self looked like shimmiring metal or glass with so many different colours it seemed so crazy i didn't know what to think. then their was a flash and it changed shape to what looked like a dumb bell like shape. when this happened mom said did you see that flash of light! she couldnt tell it changed shape with her eye but i could clearly see it in my scope.This shape was only for a few seconds then it changed back to a cone. by now(maybe 10-15min) it was getting behind some trees. i could see it only for another min or so and it was gone.
content.summary: First thought it was a star then saw it getting closer and changing colour

content.detailedDescription:
Took pics of funny looking clouds , when looking at pics seen 4 sets of lights and a dark object in the clouds 
there maybe 3 sets of lights 
when i took pics i did not see the ufos ,only after looking at pics did i see them and knew that they had to be ufos
content.summary: Took pics of funny looking clouds , when looking at pics seen 4 sets of lights and a dark object in the clouds

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
My cat has a habit of going up to the house up front and bothering the cat that lives there. i was out looking for him so that i could get him inside. looking around for him i noticed what i took to be at first an airplane flying really low. looking at it closer i couldn't see any wings or a tail section, no engines, or anything. this thing was pretty big, too. at least 30 to 50 feet long. it did appear to have something like an antenna on the rear of the craft where a tail would be. it was dark gray/brown in color. the strange thing about it is that there was absolutely no sound coming from it. no noise whatsoever. it stayed in a straight and level flight path until it disappeared behind the trees. it was almost like it was being slowly carried along by the wind, but it was no balloon or dirigible of any kind i've ever seen. there were no exterior lights on it like an airplane would have, like a strobe, or navigation lights. i couldn't tell if it had windows or not even though it was not that far away or very high. i haven't asked around, but there is a large coal fired power plant near here and somebody there must have seen it because it was headed right over it. i didn't have my phone with me so i didn't have a camera. i wish i had. i could have gotten a great picture of it because it was so low and going so slow.
i don't know what it was. i've been around airplanes a lot in my life, and this was no ordinary airplane.
content.summary: Was out trying to round up my cat. looking around i noticed ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i where walking the dog on a quiet sunday evening. on top of a local hillside, that is a golf course. noticed the object in my peripheral vision, due to the sun reflecting and glinting off it. as the object approached from the se. i thought how strange as not like any plane or helicopter? i have seen many types of aircraft. also read lots of books on aircraft. nothing at all like this.

the object was silver and reflective. like dull chrome or brushed aluminium. egg shaped. it was quite large. 30 to 40 feet across. it was traveling in a straight line quite fast into the wind. which was very constant and strong at ground level. 30mph straight in off the sea in a sw direction. the object was at about 1000 feet up. so wind would be far stronger at that altitude. it was traveling at about 3 or 4 times the top speed of a helicopter.

i had a view for at least 20 seconds. my girlfriend for about 15seconds as i had seen it first. it passed in front of us both. we where both totally focused on it and stunned. it was silent and left no vapour trail. it was illuminated, as the sun was shining directly on it. as if it was in a spotlight this enabled details to be seen. there where clearly a constant band of square or oblong windows with ribs or frames between them. or may have also been vents? these where in a belt around the centre of the craft. these appeared not to be so reflective as the body of the craft. the body of the craft was totally sleek and smooth.

the craft headed straight for a huge cloud mass which was a bit grey as if a shower cloud. it entered the cloud purposely, as if they knew they where exposed and on full view from the ground. we both scanned constantly around the edges of the cloud mass also tried to see another glimpse though the cloud. the cloud was breaking up due to the high winds and the fact the day was one of big areas of blue sky with big fast moving fluffy clouds. when the cloud started to fragment. the craft had completely disappeared???

we could only ascertain that they had used the cloud as cover in order to gain altitude into the stratosphere and beyond? we both then discussed and confirmed what each other had seen. we also looked around the area for other witnesses. however there was nobody around until at least five minutes after. another couple out walking.

 we told them what we had just seen. they had not seen anything and thought we where a bit crazy. we did not care as we where both 100% sure of what it was we had seen. not what we thought we had seen? we would both without hesitation would testify on under oath in a court of law to it. we both felt excited, privileged, a little bit unsettled. later, we both felt it was a life changing event. as it changed our believes and understanding of what we thought we knew for sure.

 it has opened up or minds. it has also allowed us to discuss all the possibilities that this raises. of us not being the only ones in the cosmos. also there are beings far more advanced than us, visiting our planet watching us. we are unable to do anything like. it makes our space exploration look pathetic. we have not even explored our front doorstep in comparison.

the reason i have reported this on here also on another site called  ufo clearinghouse? the post has also appeared on facebook? is surly somebody else locally had seen this? as the craft would have had to pass over a small neighbouring town called pembroke. it would be nice to have this sighting corroborated.

 i have reported this quickly and accurately while all details a fresh in our minds. i have not reported anything like this before? i have not really believed or give this any real thought before this happened. i am not a person who sees ghosts or believes in paranormal stuff. i have absolutely no reason to hoax, or want publicity or get any financial gain from this, i just felt i had to share a such a mind blowing encounter.
content.summary: A definite sighting of a ufo not anything man made here on earth in broad daylight.

content.detailedDescription: Look get hold of me. i have now tried to talk to you. maybe you will be able to help me understand the accounts i have had. thank you.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I have had more then one encounter over my whole life i saw the earth from space i was 3 i do have much i could tell you

content.detailedDescription: At the time i was going on to the balcony where i lived, i was going out for a cigarette with my brother who also  smokes. the first thing that caught my attention was the light coming from the clouds which  were being lit up by lightning which lit the clouds which reached  in every direction or at least as i thought it was lightning because it was exactly as it would be if i was a lightning storm except there was no thunder.Me and my  brother could see that there was an object above the clouds which was pulsing light about every five seconds and every time it pulsed light lit the whole entire cloud as far is the eye could see just like lightning  except it had no sound thunder. we couldn't physically see the object but it was obvious that the was some type of craft hovering above the clouds pulsating light, lighting the clouds up but because it was just above the clouds it was hiding it self from view. i myself and my brother are big believers in ufos the evidence is overwhelming almost undeniable so we are totally completely aware of  the existence of life from another world is not just a possibility but reality.Me and my brother was not sure what the object was until we watched it for about five minutes it was obvious that this was nothing that we humans could have the power and capabilities to perform to hover above the clouds and light the whole entire sky clouds up so we thought  it was more than likely a ufo.We  couldn't actually see the object only the sky lighting up every five seconds but with no sound until we looked straight up above our house and for a split second you could see an object which was glowing through the cloud which was in the shape of a disc,  when we saw this we just knew that it was really a ufo and we're very excited. the object was above the clouds and pulsating light for round about half an hour to an hour  eventually we got our mum to come out as well and look at this whatever it was above the clouds and we were looking at this object just above the clouds for about half an hour to an hour eventually it started to gradually and very slowly move away as it carried on to pulsate   and light the whole sky upeventually we got fed up of standing outside for nearly 1 hour as the object was in the distance but still pulsating light and causing the whole entire sky to light up. i have no doubt in my mind that this was extra terrestrial craft and life somewhere outside our universe but unfortunately this is all i have is my testimony, i am facinated by this event every time i think of this even ten years or so on, i feel much better now i have gotten it off my chest and told the world thank you.
content.summary: It was a pulsating disc hovering just above the clouds.

content.detailedDescription: Last night, around 4 am, i was awoken by a loud motor like sound. i sat up in my bed and looked out the window which was facing me, at the west end of my room. i witnessed an extremely bright white light moving closer and closer over my house to my front yard, as the sound seemed to also get closer and louder. once it reached my front yard, it seemed to have moved higher up in the sky as i couldn't see the object itself but still saw the white light it emitted on the yard/surrounding trees. moving in a straight lign, it almost looked like a comet the way it descended straight down behind the tree line. i still could see the bright light through far away tree branches, but couldn't make out an actual object. once it disappeared, the sound stopped too.
content.summary: right white light buzzing over house then descended behind tree line in middle of the night.

content.detailedDescription: Íbamos a desayunar cuando un miembro de mi familia me avisó del objeto en el cielo, salí a verlo y primero pensé que quizá era un globo, pero después d verlo bien no era nada que hubiera visto antes, subí a la parte alta dela casa para verlo mejor con ayuda de mis binoculares y comencé a fotografiarlo, no emitía sonido ni luces y se movía muy despacio,lo vimos por más de una hora hasta que desapareció en el horizonte
content.summary: Estaba cerca de la luna y se movía muy lentamente
content.locationName: Almoloya de Juárez , Estado de México

content.detailedDescription:
Hi i was taking pictures of the pigeons on the 16th floor of my balcony in 2012. some alien figures appeared in the photos but i did not notice them until this year. i did not see the figures when i took the photographs, they only appeared in the image.

i believe in ghosts/spirit entities more so than aliens but these are good photographs and i thought they would be of interest to your organization.

bridget
content.summary: Alien figures appears in photos

content.detailedDescription: i was sitting outside in the spa with my son and i noticed a light flicker on in the sky and it was as though someone had got a bright light and turned it on and the light just sat there and then it turned off. it then come on a little bit but not as bright but still  bright enough to see and to notice that it was not a star or satelitte. then when we were looking at it, it's slowly went to the left and it was not illuminating at that time. then it started flashing in one spot, and kept on flashing in the same spot for about two minutes.  i then went insi to grab a camera, the back light was turned on and i lost sight of it for about five minutes then it reappeared to the far left. it was a dull flash however it flashed for about thirty seconds in the same spot then it just disappeared.
content.summary: It was though a motorbike  head light was being turned on and off. it randomly changed position and stopped midair for a minimum of 30 sec.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside at the address in liverpool and looked up up see this strange vapour trail with puffs on it like knots on a rope, unlike regular vapour trails from local planes-as there is an airport nearby. 
it reminded me of the aurora vapour trail sightings so i snapped 3 pics. i didn't see the craft in question as it was either too high or had moved on. it was flying in a wide circular motion towards the nw.
it didn't bother me too much as i know about ets/crashed crafts/tr3bs etc. what did surprise me was that this occurred in the uk. the vapour trails eventually just expanded in size and disappeared into the surrounding atmosphere.
content.summary: I  noticed the 'donuts on a rope' style of vapour trail like the aurora and managed to snap 3 shots.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a trained aeronautical engineer, and pilot. i can a interest in ufos and am very familiar with information on youtube.  

i was waiting for the rolling stones concert to start. i noticed this grey orb passing above and abeam the stadtpark . it was definitely not a balloon, bag, uav, drone - it was definitely a orb. i have never seen personally such a object (except on youtube)

its showed no interest in the event. it maintained height, but appeared to drift with the wind as if a balloon (but was not a balloon).

i pointed it out to my friend.

no one seemed interested - as it was simply a orb.

i maintained visual contact until it was too far to see.

theoretically 100,000 witnesses (because of rolling stones concert) - but it was boring and uninteresting to look at.
content.summary: Orb passed abeam rolling stones event event (100,000 audience), at low level
